document_data.mainbody:
Halthos Blund, who was nicknamed the Hammer, was a carpenter inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Halthos was the guildmaster for the Carpenters, Roofers, & Plaisterers Guild circa 1357 DR. He worked out of the Stone Houseâ€“their headquarters on Telshambras Street in the Southern Ward.
